html:
{% set items_per_page = 15 %} {% set total_pages = (doc.items|length / items_per_page)|round(0, 'ceil')|int %} {% for i in range(0, doc.items|length, items_per_page) %} {% if not loop.first %}
{% endif %}

COMMERCIAL PROPOSAL

TEMPORARY FACILITIES

FOR

M/s LARSEN & TOUBRO LIMITED

LARSEN & TOUBRO

RFQ DETAILS: - {{ doc.rfq_details or "RFQ-WORKMENCAMP-BISHA PROJECT" }}
PROPOSAL REFERENCE: - {{ doc.proposal_reference or "DSI/2025/MAR/LT/01011A-00" }}
{{ doc.transaction_date or "26th MARCH 2025" }}

M/s LARSEN & TOUBRO LIMITED

Attention : {{ doc.attention or "Mr. Ramanatham" }}
Mob : {{ doc.contact_mobile or "+966 54 2486145" }}
Email : {{ doc.contact_email or "ram_samala@lntecc.com" }}
Project Name : {{ doc.project_name or "SUPPLY AND INSTALLATION OF PORTABLE CABIN" }}
Subject : {{ doc.subject or "RFQ- WORKMEN CAMP- BISHA PROJECT" }}

We are pleased to provide you with our proposal for the subject as follows. Please review our proposal, terms, and conditions as attached. Let us know if there is any item to be revised.

We trust this proposal will meet your requirements. Should you have any clarification, please do not hesitate to contact the undersigned.

Sayyed Akbar Hussehi
Operation Head
{{ doc.operation_head_email or "dom@desertsides.com" }}
{{ doc.operation_head_phone or "+966530148886" }}
Mujeebudheen Abdul Khdair
Executive Director
{{ doc.director_email or "director@desertsides.com" }}
{{ doc.director_phone or "+966 594297292" }}
{% if loop.first %}

COMMERCIAL PROPOSAL

M/s {{ doc.party_name or '' }} DATE: {{ doc.get_formatted('transaction_date', doc) }}
SUBJECT: {{ doc.subject or '' }} QUOTATION: {{ doc.name or '' }}
VENDOR # ADDRESS: {{ doc.address_display or '' }}
ATTN: {{ doc.contact_person or '' }} QUOTATION REF: EMAIL
MOBILE: {{ doc.contact_mobile or '' }} CONTACT PERSON: {{ doc.owner or '' }}
EMAIL: {{ doc.contact_email or '' }} EMAIL: {{ doc.owner_email or '' }}
Mobile: {{ doc.owner_mobile or '' }}

Dear Sir,

In accordance with your requirements, we are pleased to submit here with our quotation for the services as follows: (As per the attached specification).

{% endif %}
{%- for item in doc.items[i:i+items_per_page] -%} {%- endfor -%} {% if loop.last %} {% endif %}
SN Description Unit Qty Rate Amount
{{ item.idx }} {{ item.item_name or '' }} {{ item.uom or '' }} {{ item.qty | float | round(2) }} {{ "{:.2f}".format(frappe.format_value(item.rate, doc.currency) | float) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.amount, precision=2) }}
TOTAL AMOUNT {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.net_total, precision=2) }}
VAT 15% {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_taxes_and_charges, precision=2) }}
GRAND TOTAL AMOUNT IN SAR {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.grand_total, precision=2) }}

{% if loop.last %}

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

* Quote will be revised if any changes to our specifications, quantities, size and other conditions. Any exclusions from the above table, the proposal will be revised.

Ø Our offer is strictly based on the attached DSI technical Specifications.

Ø DSI presumes the site is accessible by normal road trailers. Any extra costs incurred due to inaccessibility of site or road to be charged to the client in actual.

Ø Structural design calculations shall be submitted once needed and shall have an additional cost impact.

Ø DSI PFB presumes that land is compacted and ready to install prefabricated buildings at Site.

Ø Any items not mentioned in the above BOQ are not under the DSI scope of work.

Validity : 30 days from Date of Submission.
Specification : Attached along with offer.
Warranty : Conditioned one (1) year Structural Warranty for building and one (1) year warranty for finishes.
Included : All items shown in the above table shall be included.
Payment : Partial Invoice submission shall be allowed based on the line-item completion. All the invoices shall be settled within 3-7 days from the date of the invoice submission. If an invoice is not settled within 7 days, or if site clearance for the work front is not provided despite the invoice being settled within 7 days, the client will incur a demurrage charge of 100 SAR/m²/day for space occupation.
Payment Terms : 20% payment upon drawing approval, 30% after base frame completion, 20% after structural works completion, 20% after gypsum works completion and 10% before delivery.

Note: Client will be liable for the idle charges (manpower cost and storage yard rent) due to the delays that are not due to DSI, such as non-readiness of the site, delay in approvals and agreed payment terms.

Delivery : {{doc.custom_delivery_days or '20-30'}} Days after the drawing approval and upfront payment.

* DSI is not responsible for delays of delivery due to Force Majeure or due to events which make the delivery considerably more difficult or, even if binding time periods and delivery deadlines have been agreed.

Currency : {{doc.currency or 'SAR'}}
Delivery Location : {{doc.custom_delivery_location or 'EX-FACTORY'}}
{% endif %}

Responsibility Matrix

{%- for item in doc.custom_matrix_item[i:i+items_per_page] -%} {%- endfor -%}
SN Description Client Scope DSI Scope Remarks
{{ item.idx }} {{ item.description or '' }} {%- if item.client_scope == 1 -%}✓{%- else -%}{{ item.client_scope or '' }}{%- endif -%} {%- if item.dsi_scope == 1 -%}✓{%- else -%}{{ item.dsi_scope or '' }}{%- endif -%} {{ item.remarks or ''}}

Prefab Building standard and specification

{%- for item in doc.custom_specification[i:i+items_per_page] -%} {%- endfor -%}
SN Parameters Materials Specifications
{{ item.idx }} {{ item.parameters or '' }} {{item.materials_specifications or ''}} {%- if item.image -%}
{%- endif -%}

Note: DSI has the right to substitute any specified brands/material which is not available in market with an equivalent brand.
Regards,

{% endfor %}
name: COMMERCIAL PROPOSAL

{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}

{{ item.serial_no | replace("\n", ", ") }} {%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.get_formatted("rate") }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}

{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%}
{%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Payment Advice")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) }} {%- for label, value in ( (_("Voucher Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.voucher_date)), (_("Reference / Cheque No."), doc.cheque_no), (_("Reference / Cheque Date"), frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date)) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{ _("This amount is in full / part settlement of the listed bills") }}:

{%- for label, value in ( (_("Amount"), "" + doc.get_formatted("total_amount") + "
" + (doc.total_amount_in_words or "") + "
"), (_("References"), doc.remark) ) -%}
{{ value }}
{%- endfor -%}
Prepared By
Authorised Signatory
Received Payment as Above
_____________
A/C Payee
_____________
{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.cheque_date) }}
{{ doc.pay_to_recd_from }}
{{ doc.total_amount_in_words }}
{{ doc.get_formatted("total_amount") }}
